LightningComponentBundle.description: A dynamic list view with evenly distributed columns and auto height that grows/shrinks to fit the number of rows.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: SObject API Name
property.description: API name of the object to query (e.g., Account, Contact, custom__c).

property.name: componentTitle
property.label: Title
property.description: Optional title shown in the card header.

property.name: sortableFields
property.label: Sortable Fields (subset of Fields to Display)
property.description: Comma-separated API names that should be sortable (e.g., Name,Industry)

property.name: filterFields
property.label: Filter Fields (Picklist/Multi-Picklist, subset of Fields to Display)
property.description: Comma-separated API names to expose as filters (e.g., Industry,Type,BaseModel__c)
